mapper.update:
update ${centreTableName}
table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
startdown_time = #{startdownTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
startup_time = #{startupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creattime = #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_notes = #{auditNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_check = #{lastCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sync_time = #{syncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_month = #{dataMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sync_type = #{syncType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
applyer_code = #{applyerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auditer_code = #{auditerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
syncer_code = #{syncerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

sync_begintime = #{syncBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ${centreTableName} set table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, startdown_time = #{startdownTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, startup_time = #{startupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creattime = #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audit_notes = #{auditNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_check = #{lastCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sync_time = #{syncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_month = #{dataMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sync_type = #{syncType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, applyer_code = #{applyerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditer_code = #{auditerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, syncer_code = #{syncerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_times = #{dataTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_begintime = #{auditBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sync_begintime = #{syncBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ${centreTableName}
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_notes = #{auditNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sync_time = #{syncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_code = concat_ws(',',user_code,#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
data_month = #{dataMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sync_type = #{syncType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
applyer_code = concat_ws(',',applyer_code,#{applyerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
auditer_code = concat_ws(',',auditer_code,#{auditerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
syncer_code = concat_ws(',',syncer_code,#{syncerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
audit_begintime = #{auditBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sync_begintime = #{syncBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE 1=1
and id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and table_name LIKE concat('%',#{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and data_month = #{dataMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and sync_type = #{syncType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
